workouts.name: Push-ups
workouts.description: A classic bodyweight exercise that targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

variations.name: Standard Push-up
variations.description: Perform a standard push-up with proper form.

variations.name: Wide Arm Push-up
variations.description: Place your hands wider than shoulder-width to target the chest more.

variations.name: Diamond Push-up
variations.description: Place your hands close together in a diamond shape to target the triceps.

variations.name: Incline Push-up
variations.description: Place your hands on an elevated surface to make it easier.

variations.name: Decline Push-up
variations.description: Place your feet on an elevated surface to increase difficulty.

workouts.name: Squats
workouts.description: A lower body exercise that targets the quads, hamstrings, and glutes.

variations.name: Bodyweight Squat
variations.description: Perform a standard squat without weights.

variations.name: Jump Squat
variations.description: Add a jump at the top of the squat for an explosive movement.

variations.name: Pistol Squat
variations.description: Perform a one-legged squat for advanced strength.

variations.name: Sumo Squat
variations.description: Widen your stance and point your toes outward to target the inner thighs.

variations.name: Bulgarian Split Squat
variations.description: Place one foot behind you on a bench for a single-leg squat variation.

workouts.name: Plank
workouts.description: A core exercise that strengthens the abs, shoulders, and back.

variations.name: Standard Plank
variations.description: Hold a plank position with your body in a straight line.

variations.name: Side Plank
variations.description: Hold a plank on one side to target the obliques.

variations.name: Plank with Arm Lift
variations.description: Lift one arm at a time while holding the plank position.

variations.name: Plank with Leg Lift
variations.description: Lift one leg at a time while holding the plank position.

variations.name: Plank Jacks
variations.description: Jump your feet in and out while holding the plank position.

workouts.name: Burpees
workouts.description: A full-body exercise that combines a squat, push-up, and jump.

variations.name: Standard Burpee
variations.description: Perform a full burpee with a push-up and jump.

variations.name: No Push-up Burpee
variations.description: Skip the push-up for an easier variation.

variations.name: Jump Over Burpee
variations.description: Jump over an object after each burpee.

variations.name: Burpee with Tuck Jump
variations.description: Add a tuck jump at the end for more intensity.

variations.name: Burpee with Push-up and Jump
variations.description: Perform a full burpee with a push-up and jump.

workouts.name: Lunges
workouts.description: A lower body exercise that targets the quads, hamstrings, and glutes.

variations.name: Forward Lunge
variations.description: Step forward with one leg and lower your body.

variations.name: Reverse Lunge
variations.description: Step backward with one leg and lower your body.

variations.name: Walking Lunge
variations.description: Perform lunges while walking forward.

variations.name: Lateral Lunge
variations.description: Step to the side and lower your body.

variations.name: Jumping Lunge
variations.description: Add a jump between lunges for more intensity.

workouts.name: Mountain Climbers
workouts.description: A cardio exercise that targets the core and legs.

variations.name: Standard Mountain Climbers
variations.description: Perform mountain climbers at a steady pace.

variations.name: Slow Mountain Climbers
variations.description: Perform mountain climbers slowly for more control.

variations.name: Cross-body Mountain Climbers
variations.description: Bring your knee to the opposite elbow for more core engagement.

variations.name: High-intensity Mountain Climbers
variations.description: Perform mountain climbers as fast as possible.

variations.name: Mountain Climbers with Push-up
variations.description: Add a push-up after each set of mountain climbers.

workouts.name: Jumping Jacks
workouts.description: A cardio exercise that improves heart health and endurance.

variations.name: Standard Jumping Jacks
variations.description: Perform jumping jacks at a steady pace.

variations.name: Slow Jumping Jacks
variations.description: Perform jumping jacks slowly for more control.

variations.name: High-intensity Jumping Jacks
variations.description: Perform jumping jacks as fast as possible.

variations.name: Jumping Jacks with Squat
variations.description: Add a squat after each set of jumping jacks.

variations.name: Cross-body Jumping Jacks
variations.description: Cross your arms and legs during each jump.

workouts.name: Deadlifts
workouts.description: A strength exercise that targets the hamstrings, glutes, and lower back.

variations.name: Standard Deadlift
variations.description: Perform a standard deadlift with proper form.

variations.name: Romanian Deadlift
variations.description: Focus on the hamstrings by keeping your legs straight.

variations.name: Sumo Deadlift
variations.description: Widen your stance and grip the bar inside your legs.

variations.name: Single-leg Deadlift
variations.description: Perform a deadlift on one leg for balance and strength.

variations.name: Kettlebell Deadlift
variations.description: Use a kettlebell for a different grip and feel.

workouts.name: Bench Press
workouts.description: A strength exercise that targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

variations.name: Barbell Bench Press
variations.description: Perform a bench press with a barbell.

variations.name: Dumbbell Bench Press
variations.description: Perform a bench press with dumbbells.

variations.name: Incline Bench Press
variations.description: Perform a bench press on an incline bench.

variations.name: Decline Bench Press
variations.description: Perform a bench press on a decline bench.

variations.name: Close-grip Bench Press
variations.description: Use a close grip to target the triceps more.

workouts.name: Pull-ups
workouts.description: A strength exercise that targets the back, shoulders, and arms.

variations.name: Standard Pull-up
variations.description: Perform a pull-up with an overhand grip.

variations.name: Chin-up
variations.description: Perform a pull-up with an underhand grip.

variations.name: Wide-grip Pull-up
variations.description: Use a wide grip to target the lats more.

variations.name: Close-grip Pull-up
variations.description: Use a close grip to target the biceps more.

variations.name: Weighted Pull-up
variations.description: Add weight to increase difficulty.
